post.text: With 35 days left, Hillary's in PA with Elizabeth Banks talking about how she'll help kids and families. Join the live conversation on affordable child care, paid family leave, and ensuring that every kid can get a quality education. â†“

comment.author: Nicole
comment.text: Even my Daughter she's 6 years old asked me if she can vote for Hillary

replies.author: Samuel
replies.text: Your daughter isn't that smart then.

replies.author: Kelsey
replies.text: She needs to be told ALL the facts first! Your daughter might be able to tell YOU NOT to vote Clinton! She does NOTHING but LIE, steal, use people and is the MOST CROOKED person I have EVER MET!!!! Read or listen to BOTH sides before your daughter decides! GB

replies.author: Allyson
replies.text: Sure she can vote! Democrats are and have been registering deceased people, illegal aliens, felons so on... So sure, why not a 6 yr old? Sounds legit..sarc

replies.author: Katie
replies.text: The Republicans and their billionaire buddies engage in voter fraud. Read and research.
